attributes.action: Stop government from cutting grants for university students
attributes.additional_details:
STOP GOVERMENT FROM CUTTING STUDENT GRANTS .

Government have already made it hard by raising tuition fees from £3000 to £9000 and cuts to grants will hit all students fro
attributes.background:
The governments are to go ahead with proposed plans to cut grants for all students from Sept 2016 and give them upto £9000 loans per year. 

Not only will this have negative affect but also it will make it near impossible for students to go into university who are from low income families

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:  
 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/109649
 
You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
